title: Number of registered voters in the United States 1996 to 2018
yAxis: Number of registered voters in millions
summary: Overall Number of registered voters in millions has decreased over the Year.
Number of registered voters in millions is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2016, and finally roughly constant from 2016 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2016.
Maximum Number of registered voters in millions, about 157.6 was reported at Year 2016
The lowest Number of registered voters in millions, of value 142.17 was reported at Year 2014
